allow: Bash(sqlite3 data/database/stock_data.db "SELECT name, block2_min_candles_after_block1 as ''B2_min'', block2_max_candles_after_block1 as ''B2_max'', block3_min_candles_after_block2 as ''B3_min'', block3_max_candles_after_block2 as ''B3_max'', block4_min_candles_after_block3 as ''B4_min'', block4_max_candles_after_block3 as ''B4_max'' FROM redetection_condition_preset WHERE name=''default_redetect'';")
